title: Research on the Visualization of Spatio-Temporal Data
abstract: Spatio-temporal data visualization technology, with the help of data analysis methods and interactive technologies, help people to understand the information, knowledge, and wisdom behind the data more intuitively and efficiently. It has become a powerful tool for people to analyze and control data in the era of information explosion. This paper summarize visualization methods for spatio-temporal data and provides a classification of existing analytical methods, visualization techniques, tools and field of application, and briefly analyze the challenges and development trends of spatio-temporal data visualization.
